mapper.select: SELECT c.challenge_id, c.title, c.description, c.duration, c.type, c.goal, COUNT(uc.user_id) AS participant_count, CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM UserChallenges WHERE user_id = #{userId} -- 현재 사용자 ID AND challenge_id = c.challenge_id) THEN 'joined' ELSE 'not_joined' END AS participation_status FROM Challenges AS c LEFT JOIN UserChallenges AS uc ON c.challenge_id = uc.challenge_id GROUP BY c.challenge_id, c.created_at ORDER BY c.created_at DESC;
